publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1876 Willie Coffey: Congratulations to Park School—That the Parliament congratulates Park School, Kilmarnock, on its victory in the 2008 Camanachd National First Shinty indoor 5-a-side tournament in Aviemore; notes the team’s fantastic record of winning four out of its five games in the tournament, with the loss of just one goal for 11 scored, and congratulates all of the players on their tremendous achievement.
S3M-1876 Congratulations to Park School (lodged on 9 May 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1876 Congratulations to Park School (lodged on 9 May 2008) Sandra White*, John Wilson*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-1876 Congratulations to Park School (lodged on 9 May 2008) Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-1876 Congratulations to Park School (lodged on 9 May 2008) Dave Thompson*
